title: nullama
author: nullama
content: Some people might want to accept Bitcoin for their goods and services, but might not know where to start.Here is a list of Bitcoin Payment Processors that anyone can use to start accepting Bitcoin as payment. No third party needed. No permissions required. Just you and your client.The up to date list with links is available in the source, here: https://github.com/alexk111/awesome-bitcoin-payment-processors
